titleStmt.title: I A. B. do sincerely promise and swear, that I will be faithful, and bear true allegiance to his majesty King William. So help me God
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
A loyalty oath, as, for example, Public General Acts 1 William and Mary.c.2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
